sections.comments: COMM 390 is an activity-focused course providing the opportunity to study and practice forms of writing needed in business. COMM 390 Sections 101, 102, 119, and 120 will be offered as part of UBC's Flexible Learning Initiative. The in person portion will be conducted online. Credit will be given for only one of COMM 390 or ENGL 301. Once admitted to the BCom program, students may not take ENGL 301 for credit towards their degree.

COMM 390 is an activity-focused course providing the opportunity to study and practice forms of writing needed in business. Credit will be given for only one of COMM 390 or ENGL 301. Once admitted to the BCom program, students may not take ENGL 301 for credit towards their degree.This section has been scheduled to accommodate students who will be studying in time zones across Asia during Term 1 of 2020W.  If you will be studying in a time zone within the Western Hemisphere, we kindly ask that you choose a different section that starts before 5:00 p.m.  If seats are still remaining in this section once all students have registered by the end of July, you can consider switching into this section.
